subject: Western Union wishes to inf
body:
Western Union wishes to inform you that the United Nation and (ECO-WAS) have instructed us to send to you the sum of $ 800,000.00 USD. The only thing you have to do is to send your western union receiving name so that you can help us to send you your first $ 5,000 daily until the total amount of $ 800,000.00 is fully transferred to you. so you have to send your western union receiving name below,
First Name: ...................
Last Name: ...................
your country: ...................
your city: .......................

subject: Re:    Western Union wishes to inf
body:
Hello there,

Wow, that sounds like an amazing opportunity! I'm really excited to hear more about this. Can you please explain a bit more about how this process works? And also, why was I chosen for this? 

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Linda
